author: mmusich
body:
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/40566

#### PR description:

  * de-clutter `Alignment/OfflineValidation/test` by moving the testing bash scripts into a dedicated sub-folder (4d3cda7294e95671237aa29a10c357e603df638e)
  * reduce the verbosity of the goemetry comparison plotter (6cfc315fcba2b3506251393caedf696e4fc24f93)
  * reduce the number of events in `GeneralTrackAnalyser` unit test (87d68c4564e4d8a712202cbb530da8a3b11e092c)

#### PR validation:

Run `scram b runtests use-ibeos`

title: Reorganize `Alignment/OfflineValidation` unit tests
